Name: The Humbling of a Holy Maiden
About the game: Originally released by Japanese indie developer Nighttime Sheep, Love Lab now brings you the English version of this sexy, kinky, and surprisingly thoughtful kinetic visual novel! --- The Tree of Life is dead and withered, and the kingdom's Holy Maiden longs to be disgraced. An unquenchable thirst leads the noble maiden down a slippery slope to sweet corruption. You have come from another world to teach her what it means to love. Drink from her flowing nectar and sow the white seeds of immorality within her womb! Enjoy these two sides to Seina the Holy Maiden as you teach her the carnal ways of your own world. --- Features: + Isekai-themed story by doujin developer porori + Voice acting by Japanese voice actress Shino Saaya + Gorgeous uncensored art from illustrator Giuniu + 14 sex scenes featuring different positions and kinks + Scene replay mode for quick access to your favorite scenes + CG gallery + Around 4 hours of playtime
